pageProduct.name: OGX Argan Oil of Morocco Intense Moisturizing Treatment 237mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OGX Argan Oil of Morocco Intense Moisturising Hair Treatment helps to penetrate the hair shaft restoring shine and softness while strengthening.

OGX Renewing+ Argan Oil of Morocco Intense Moisturising Hair Treatment
Why You Want It... This exotic, precious blend with argan oil of Morocco helps penetrate, moisturize, revive and create softness and strength while protecting your hair from harmful heat and UV damage. Discover smooth, sexy tresses.

A unique, precious blend with argan oil of Morocco that instantly helps to penetrate the hair shaft restoring shine and softness while strengthening.  It's a personal rescue mission for your hair.


  • Deep conditioning treatment with argan oil, which is known as a natural source of vitamin E,

  • Deliver brilliant shine and lush softness with no residue

  • Can be used as a hair mask or as a deep conditioner

Size: 237mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Intense Moisturising Treatment
• Argan Oil of Morocco
• Restores Shine & Softness
• Stengthening



Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cetyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Steareth-20, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Amodimethicone, Glycol Distearate, Polyquaternium-47, Polyquaternium-37, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red (CI 16035).

Directions

Scoop a small amount into palm and evenly distribute with a wide toothed comb from your hair's roots down to the ends. Leave treatment in hair for 3-5 minutes. Product performance is enhanced by placing a shower cap over hair and wrapping cap with a hot wet towel. Rinse with mild to cool water. For best results use conjunction with other OGX products.
